message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product. I believe it has tremendous value and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to part with it for $12000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11500. It's a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I am willing to pay $11000 for the product. I hope this meets in the middle and we can reach a satisfactory agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11800. It's still a fair price considering the product's value. What do you think?
Hello Alice, I appreciate your persistence. I am willing to pay $11500 for the product. This is my final offer. I hope we can agree on this price.
I appreciate your final offer, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $11700?
Hello Alice, I understand your position. I am willing to pay $11600 for the product. This is my final offer. I hope we can agree on this price.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob, but I'm starting to get a bit frustrated with the back-and-forth. I'm willing to give a bit more, but I'm not going to go any lower than $11800. That's my final offer. Take it or leave it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your final offer. Considering the negotiations, I am willing to pay $11700 for the product. This is my final offer. I hope we can agree on this price.
